mapper.select: SELECT c.CONTENT_ID , c.CATEGORY_CODE , c.TITLE , c.FIRST_IMAGE , c.TEL , c.HOMEPAGE , c.PLAY_TIME , c.CREATED_TIME , c.MODIFIED_TIME , c.STATUS , l.LODGING_EXP , l.CHECK_IN , l.CHECK_OUT , l.PARKING , l.ELEVATOR FROM TB_CONTENT c JOIN TB_LODGING l ON(c.CONTENT_ID = l.CONTENT_ID) WHERE c.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} AND c.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY c.CREATED_TIME DESC , c.MODIFIED_TIME DESC
